name: Number Wizard 1.2
description:
Hello! This is my first game :)

It isn't meant to be great, but I did learn a lot from it! I hope you like you it.

Note that the quit button doesn't work in the web browser version :P

UPDATE 1.1: Noticed that the wizard almost never won, so I increased the guesses from 10 to 15.

UPDATE 1.2: Added a web browser version! Now you don't need to download anything :)
